title: [Large-Scale] Simulation-Based Remote Power System Experimental Education

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic electrical engineering theory and understanding of power system components
context.additional_context: Simulation-based remote lab education to overcome limitations of in-person experiments post-COVID-19. Strengthening practical power system experimentation competencies applicable to workplace settings for learners in managerial/leadership roles within enterprises.

learning_goals: Independently perform power flow analysis experiments using the PowerWorld simulator
Explain power system fault conditions and protection coordination concepts based on simulation results
Analyze experimental data and write field-applicable reports through team-based PBL (Problem-Based Learning)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
